list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the action of speaking or acting on behalf of someone or the state of being so represented.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: asylum-seekers should be guaranteed good legal advice and representation
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người xin tị nạn nên được đảm bảo tư vấn và đại diện pháp lý tốt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the description or portrayal of someone or something in a particular way or as being of a certain nature.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the representation of women in newspapers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đại diện của phụ nữ trên báo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: formal statements made to a higher authority, especially so as to communicate an opinion or register a protest.
